snippet: The movie “Computer Chess” captures a time when human champions were first challenged by computer programs.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column examines match played in movie Computer Chess.
lead_paragraph: The movie “Computer Chess” captures a time when human champions were first challenged by computer programs.

headline.main: Movie Reflects the Rivalry of Humans vs. Computers
headline.print_headline: Movie Reflects the Rivalry Of Humans vs. Computers
